snippet: In time for the anniversary of the occupation of Zuccotti Park on Sept. 17, Occupy Wall Street's Alternative Banking group is offering for sale a set of anti-capitalist playing cards.
abstract: In time for the anniversary of the occupation of Zuccotti Park on Sept. 17, Occupy Wall Street's Alternative Banking group is offering for sale a set of anti-capitalist playing cards.

headline.main: In a Deck of Cards, Finding ‘52 Shades of Greed'
